attributes.action: Make BSL free to all parents of Deaf children
attributes.additional_details: As a CODA (child of Deaf adults) and TOD (Teacher of the Deaf) I have 40 years of both personal and professional experience
attributes.background: Too many BSL users find themselves in isolation. Also a lack of understanding around them in order to support and develop their needs. Signing and spoken language can go hand in hand. It will not hold them back!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to fund free BSL lessons for every parent or carer of a Deaf child, if that's what you'd like to happen.
